makeMap(int) - Method in class model.map.MapBuilder
makeMap builds the correct map from json according to the mapID index given in input.
Map - Class in model.map
The class map represents the arena of the game.
Map() - Constructor for class model.map.Map
 
MapBuilder - Class in model.map
The MapBuilder class has only one method used to build the correct map given an integer identifier in input.
MapBuilder() - Constructor for class model.map.MapBuilder
Default constructor, builds the json GSON parser and and empty Map object

match - Variable in class client.GUI.FirstPage
 
match - Variable in class client.GUI.Ranking
 
match - Variable in class client.GUI.WeaponsOwned
 
Match - Class in model
This is the most important class of model package Contains all the match information, from the players, to the map, the decks and the killshotTrack
Match() - Constructor for class model.Match
Default costructor, builds a complete match, shuffles the decks It does not build the map It exposes only a lot of getter and setter methods, the actual logic is in the controller package
Match(Match) - Constructor for class model.Match
This constructor builds a copy of a given match without givin the decks (this object is pushed to the clients)
MatchController - Class in controller
 
MatchController() - Constructor for class controller.MatchController
 
MatchController(Match) - Constructor for class controller.MatchController
 
minDistBetweenSquares(Square, Square) - Method in class controller.MatchController
 
minDistBetweenSquares(Square, Square) - Method in class controller.MoveController
This method returns the minimum distance between 2 given squares
model - package model
Describes all the Adrenaline game objects and parts
model.ammo - package model.ammo
Contains a lot of ammo
model.map - package model.map
Contains all the classes used to describe the arenas
model.player - package model.player
Contains all the classes used to model a player
model.powerup - package model.powerup
Contains all the powerUp cards definitions, effects and deck
model.weapons - package model.weapons
This class contains all the weapons definitions, effects, deck

move(int, int, int) - Method in class server.RMIHandler.ServerControllerRMI
This method is called when a player wants to make a move in the game It delegates to matchController the actual move
move(Player, Square, int) - Method in class controller.MatchController
 
move(Player, Square, int) - Method in class controller.MoveController
Given a Player, a destination Square and the maxDistanceAllowed, this method changes the player position only if the move is allowed by the map configuration.
moveButton() - Method in class client.GUI.MainPage
 
MoveController - Class in controller
This controller manages all the move actions, controls and stuff

The constructor needs in input the match, to be linked with all the other objects in the game
